The List of Taboos is a list of Arkham H.msgid: The List of Taboos is a list of Arkham Horror: The Card Game cards with optional deckbuilding restrictions or text changes. This list is designed to craft a healthy balance between investigator power and scenario difficulty, and to enforce shifts in deckbuilding environments over time.
msgstr: Die Liste der Tabus besteht aus einer Liste von Arkham Horror: Das Kartenspiel-Karten mit optionalen Deckbau-Einschränkungen oder Textänderungen. Diese Liste wurde entwickelt, um eine gesunde Balance zwischen der Stärke von Ermittlern und der Schwierigkeit von Szenarien herzustellen und im Laufe der Zeit Änderungen beim Deckbau zu fördern.

Adhering to The List of Taboos is comple.msgid: Adhering to The List of Taboos is completely optional. Investigators are not forced to adhere to the restrictions on this list, but if an investigator chooses to do so, they must do so in full (an investigator cannot pick and choose which restrictions to use).
msgstr: Die Liste der Tabus ist völlig optional. Ermittler sind nicht dazu gezwungen, sich an die Einschränkungen dieser Liste zu halten. Wenn sich ein Ermittler aber dazu entscheidet, sollte er sich umfänglich daran halten (er kann nicht aussuchen, welche Einschränkung er verwendet und welche nicht).

Note: not all cards have translations av.msgid: Note: not all cards have translations available.
msgstr: Hinweis: Nicht alle Karten haben Übersetzungen.

Error loading cards, make sure your netw.msgid: Error loading cards, make sure your network is working.
msgstr: Fehler beim Laden der Karten. Stelle sicher, dass deine Internetverbindung funktioniert.

This deck does not seem to be part of a.msgid:
This deck does not seem to be part of a campaign yet.

If you add this deck to a campaign, the app can keep track of the available weaknesses between multiple decks.

Otherwise, you can draw random weaknesses from your entire collection.
msgstr:
Dieses Deck scheint noch nicht Teil einer Kampagne zu sein.

Wenn du dieses Deck zu einer Kampagne hinzufügst, kann die App den Überblick über die verfügbaren Schwächen zwischen mehreren Decks behalten.

Ansonsten kannst du zufällige Schwächen aus deiner Sammlung ziehen.

ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site.msgid:
ArkhamDB is a popular deck building site where you can manage and share decks with others.

Sign in to access your decks or share decks you have created with others.
msgstr:
ArkhamDB ist eine beliebte Deckbau-Seite, auf der man Decks verwalten und mit anderen teilen kann.

Melde dich an, um auf deine Decks zuzugreifen oder sie mit anderen zu teilen.

We are having trouble talking to ArkhamD.msgid:
We are having trouble talking to ArkhamDB.

If the problem persists, please try to reauthorize.
msgstr:
Wir haben Probleme ArkhamDB zu erreichen. 

Wenn das Problem anhält, versuche dich erneut bei ArkhamDB anzumelden.

There are no weaknesses that match these.msgid:
There are no weaknesses that match these trait filters left in the set.

Please adjust the trait filter.
msgstr:
Es gibt keine Schwächen, die mit diesen Filtereinstellungen übereinstimmen, die im Set übrig bleiben.

Bitte passe die Filtereinstellungen an.

Data on ArkhamDB will be preserved, but.msgid:
Data on ArkhamDB will be preserved, but all Campaign data and any edits made without internet might be lost.

If you are having trouble with your account you can also reconnect.
msgstr:
Die Daten auf ArkhamDB bleiben erhalten, aber alle Kampagnendaten und alle Änderungen, die ohne Internet gemacht werden, können verloren gehen.

Wenn du Probleme mit deinem Konto hast, kannst du dich auch neu verbinden.

It has been more than a week since you c.msgid:
It has been more than a week since you checked for new cards.
Check for new cards from ArkhamDB?
msgstr:
Zuletzt wurde vor über einer Woche nach neuen Karten gesucht.
ArkhamDB auf neue Karten überprüfen?

No campaigns yet.\n\nUse the + button to.msgid:
No campaigns yet.

Use the + button to create a new one.

You can use this app to keep track of campaigns, including investigator trauma, the chaos bag, basic weaknesses, campaign notes and the experience values for all decks.
msgstr:
Noch keine Kampagnen.

Mit dem +-Button kannst du eine neue Kampagne erstellen.

Mit dieser App kannst du Kampagnen verfolgen, darunter Ermittler-Traumata, den Chaos-Beutel, Grundschwächen, Kampagnennotizen und die Erfahrungswerte für alle Decks.

You can upload your deck to ArkhamDB to.msgid:
You can upload your deck to ArkhamDB to share with others.

After doing this you will need network access to make changes to the deck.
msgstr:
Du kannst dein Deck auf ArkhamDB hochladen, um es mit anderen zu teilen.

Danach benötigst du eine Internetverbindung, um Änderungen am Deck vorzunehmen.

It looks like you deleted this deck from.msgid:
It looks like you deleted this deck from ArkhamDB.

If it was part of a campaign you can add the same investigator back to restore your campaign data.
msgstr:
Es sieht so aus, als ob du dieses Deck von ArkhamDB gelöscht hast.

Wenn es Teil einer Kampagne war, kannst du den gleichen Ermittler erneut hinzufügen, um deine Kampagnendaten wiederherzustellen.

By upgrading a deck, you can track XP an.msgid:
By upgrading a deck, you can track XP and story card upgrades as your campaign develops.

Previous versions of your deck will still be accessible.
msgstr:
Durch das Upgrade eines Decks kannst du XP und Storykarten-Upgrades verfolgen, während sich deine Kampagne entwickelt.

Frühere Versionen deines Decks sind weiterhin zugänglich.

You can opt-in to always seeing taboos a.msgid: You can opt-in to always seeing taboos and buiding decks with them in Settings.
msgstr: Es kann jederzeit in den Einstellungen gewählt werden, die Tabuliste anzuzeigen und bei der Deckerstellung zu verwenden.

Looks like you are trying to undo a deck.msgid:
Looks like you are trying to undo a deck upgrade.

Note that the app will NOT delete your latest deck upgrade from ArkhamDB, so your deck will still have the earlier changes applied.

You can view the deck and delete the most recent 'upgrade' to put things back the way they were.
msgstr:
Scheinbar soll ein Deck Upgrade rückgängig gemacht werden.

Beachte, dass die App NICHT das letzte Upgrade von ArkhamDB löscht, sodass das Deck weiterhin die Änderungen behält.

Das Deck kann angezeigt und anschließend das letzte 'Upgrade' gelöscht werden, um den Zustand des Decks zurückzusetzen.

msgstr: Scheinbar gibt es Probleme beim Laden dieses Decks

It looks like one or more deck upgrades.msgid:
It looks like one or more deck upgrades are unsaved. If you would like the app to track spent experience as you make deck changes, please go back and press 'Save deck upgrade' on each investigator before proceeding to the next scenario.

Once an upgrade has been saved, you can edit the deck as normal and the app will properly track the experience cost for any changes you make (the original versions of the deck can still be viewed from the deck's menu).
msgstr:
Scheinbar wurden ein oder mehrere Deck-Upgrades nicht gespeichert. Wenn die App ausgegebene Erfahrungspunkte erfassen soll, gehe zurück und wähle 'Deck Upgrade speichern' bei jedem Ermittler bevor zum nächsten Szenario vorgerückt wird. 

Sobald das Upgrade gespeichert wurde, kann das Deck ganz normal bearbeitet werden und die App erfasst die Erfahrungspunkte für jede Änderung (die originale Version des Decks kann weiterhin über das Deck Menu angezeigt werden).

It looks like you edited the experience.msgid: It looks like you edited the experience or trauma for an investigator, but have not saved it yet. Please go back and select ‘Save adjustments’ to ensure your changes are saved.
msgstr: Scheinbar wurden Erfahrungspunkte oder Traumata für einen Ermittler geändert aber nicht gespeichert. Bitte gehe zurück und wähle 'Anpassungen speichern' um sicherzustellen, dass die Änderungen gespeichert wurden.

Are you sure you want to remove this dec.msgid:
Are you sure you want to remove this deck from the campaign?

After removing the deck you will be able to select a different deck, but experience and story assets will only be saved as you complete new scenarios.
msgstr:
Soll dieses Deck wirklich aus der Kampagne entfernt werden?

Nachdem dieses Deck aus der Kampagne entfernt wurde, kann ein anderes Deck gewählt werden. Allerdings werden Erfahrungspunkte und Story-Vorteilskarten nur gespeichert, wenn ein neues Szenario beendet wird.

Since this investigator has participated.msgid:
Since this investigator has participated in one or more scenarios during this campaign, they cannot be removed.

However, you can choose to have them not participate in future scenarios of this campaign.
msgstr:
Dieser Ermittler kann nicht entfernt werden, da er an einem oder mehreren Szenarien in dieser Kampagne teilgenommen hat.

Es kann allerdings gewählt werden, diesen Ermittler nicht an zukünftigen Szenarien teilnehmen zu lassen.

Campaign A and Campaign B\nEight-part ca.msgid:
Campaign A and Campaign B
Eight-part campaign
msgstr:
Kampagne A und Kampagne B
Achtteilige Kampagne

Parallel investigator options should onl.msgid: Parallel investigator options should only be selected at deck creation time, not between scenarios.
msgstr: Die Option, den parallelen Ermittler zu wählen, ist nur zum Zeitpunkt der Deckerstellung möglich.

The <i>${ scenario.scenario_name }</i> c.msgid: The ${ scenario.scenario_name } challenge scenario centers around the investigator ${ investigator.name }, and therefore has the following prerequisites:
msgstr: Das Herausforderungsszenario ${ scenario.scenario_name } dreht sich um den Ermittler ${ investigator.name }. Deshalb gelten folgende Grundvoraussetzungen:

${ investigator.name } must be chosen as.msgid: ${ investigator.name } must be chosen as one of the investigators when playing this scenario.
msgstr: ${ investigator.name } muss als einer der Ermittler für dieses Szenario gewählt werden.

The app does not enforce Challenge Scena.msgid: The app does not enforce Challenge Scenario prerequisites, so please confirm that they apply manually.
msgstr: Die App erzwingt nicht die besonderen Anforderungen für Herausforderungsszenarien. Dies muss manuell sichergestellt werden.

Experience cost: ${ challengeCost } for.msgid: Experience cost: ${ challengeCost } for ${ investigator.name }, ${ xpCost } for each other investigator
msgstr: Erfahrungspunktekosten: ${ challengeCost } für ${ investigator.name }, ${ xpCost } für jeden anderen Ermittler

Challenge scenarios are special print-an.msgid: Challenge scenarios are special print-and-play scenarios that utilize existing products in the Arkham Horror: The Card Game collection, along with additional print-and-play cards, to create new content. These scenarios are designed with certain prerequisites in mind, in order to craft a challenging puzzle-like experience. Printable cards can be downloaded from Fantasy Flight Games under the "Parallel Investigators" section.
msgstr: Herausforderungsszenarios sind spezielle „Print and Play“-Szenarios, die bereits vorhandene Produkte aus der Arkham Horror: Das Kartenspiel-Sammlung nutzen und mit „Print and Play“-Karten kombinieren, um neue Abenteuer zu erschaffen. Diese Szenarios werden mit bestimmten Grundvoraussetzungen entwickelt, um ein herausforderndes und kniffliges Erlebnis zu erschaffen.

msgstr:
Soll ${ investigator.name } wirklich aus der Kampagne entfernt werden?

Verknüpfte Kampagnenlogbuch-Einträge gehen möglicherweise verloren.

<b>Note:</b> Trauma from investigator de.msgid: Note: Trauma from investigator defeat is handled during scenario resolution.
msgstr: Hinweis: Trauma von besiegten Ermittlern wird in der Szenario Auflösung abgehandelt.

Side scenarios cannot be added to a camp.msgid: Side scenarios cannot be added to a campaign until the previous scenario and following interludes are completed.
msgstr: Nebengeschichten können nicht zu einer Kampagne hinzugefügt werden bevor das vorherige Szenario und das folgende Zwischenspiel abgeschlossen sind.

Missing card #${ code }. Please try upda.msgid: Missing card #${ code }. Please try updating cards from ArkhamDB in settings.
msgstr: Fehlende Karte #${ code }. Bitte versuche, die Karten von ArkhamDB in den Einstellungen zu updaten.

This app expects an Arkham Cards backup.msgid: This app expects an Arkham Cards backup file (.acb/.json)
msgstr: Diese App erwartet Arkham Cards backup Dateien (.acb/.json)

This feature will let you restore data f.msgid:
This feature will let you restore data from a lost device. If you were signed into ArkhamDB, please reauthorize before importing campaign data.

After a backup is selected, you will be able to choose which data to import.
msgstr:
Dieser Punkt erlubt die Wiederherstellung von Daten von einem verlorenen Gerät. Falls sie bei ArkhamDB eingeloggt waren, müssen sie sich dort wieder einloggen.

Nachdem ein Backup ausgewählt wurde, können die Daten ausgewählt werden, die importiert werden sollen.

This will let you backup your local deck.msgid: This will let you backup your local decks and campaigns for safe-keeping. This can also be used to move them to another device.
msgstr: Dieser Punk erlaubt das Backup lokaler Decks und Kampagnen. Dieser Punkt kann auch verwendet werden, um diese Daten auf andere Geräte zu übertragen.

It looks like you previously denied allo.msgid: It looks like you previously denied allowing Arkham Cards to read/write external files. Please visit your System settings to adjust this permission, and try again.
msgstr: Scheinbar wurde Arkham Cards zuvor das schreibe/verändern externer Dateien nicht erlaubt. Bitte ändere dies in den Systemeinstellungen und versuche es erneut.

It seems like you have chosen to import.msgid: It seems like you have chosen to import a campaign without importing one or more non-ArkhamDB decks. The campaign can still be imported, however the deck information will be removed.
msgstr: Scheinbar wurde eine Kampagne ohne ein oder mehrere Nicht-ArkhamDB Decks importiert. Die Kampagne kann weiterhin importiert werden, allerdings werden die Deck Informationen entfernt.

Local version appears to be newer:.msgid: Local version appears to be newer:
msgstr: Lokale Version scheint neuer zu sein:

You can only edit trauma here between sc.msgid:
You can only edit trauma here between scenarios.

During scenario play it can be edited using the scenario guide.
msgstr:
Traumata können nur zwischen Szenarien geändert werden.

Während eines laufenden Szenarios kann eine Änderung über die Szenariobeschreibung erfolgen.

Starting trauma can be adjusted after 'C.msgid: Starting trauma can be adjusted after 'Campaign Setup' has been completed.
msgstr: Traumata, mit denen begonnen wird, können nach der 'Kampagnen Vorbereitung' angepasst werden.

Changing app language requires downloadi.msgid: Changing app language requires downloading the translated card information from ArkhamDB. This requires network and can take some time.
msgstr: Eine Änderung der Sprache der App erfordert einen Download der übersetzten Kartendaten von ArkhamDB. Dies dauert einige Zeit.

Would you like to download updated cards.msgid:
Would you like to download updated cards from ArkhamDB to match your phone's preferred language (${ lang })?

You can override your language preference for this app in Settings.
msgstr:
Sollen die Karten von ArkhamDB geupdated werden, um den Spracheinstellungen (${ lang }) deines Gerätes zu entsprechen? 

Die Spracheinstellungen für diese App können in den Einstellungen geändert werden.
Die App hat einen Tentakelmarker gezogen

Sorry about that. If the app is crashing.msgid: Sorry about that. If the app is crashing on launch, you can enter 'Safe mode' to backup your data.
msgstr: Es tut uns leid. Falls die App bei Start abgestürzt ist, können sie "Safe mode" eingeben, um die Daten zu sichern.

The following questions contain light sp.msgid: The following questions contain light spoilers for this scenario.
msgstr: Die folgenden Fragen enthalten minimale Spoiler für dieses Szenario.

Do not count towards deck size.msgid: Do not count towards deck size

Faction: ${ card.faction_name }, Cost: $.msgid: Faction: ${ card.faction_name }, Cost: ${ cost }, Level: ${ level }
msgstr: Klasse: ${ card.faction_name }, Kosten: ${ cost }, Level: ${ level }

This can be used to make the app font si.msgid: This can be used to make the app font size larger, though it may impact layout on some screens.
msgstr: Hiermit kann die Schrift in der App vergrößert werden. Dies kann allerdings das Bildschirmlayout beeinflussen.

Keep level ${ level } after upgrade\nWon.msgid:
Keep level ${ level } after upgrade
Won't count towards deck size
msgstr:
Behalte das Level ${ level } nach dem Upgrade
Wird nicht gegen die Deckgröße gezählt

This upgrade will cost ${ xpCost } exper.msgid: This upgrade will cost ${ xpCost } experience.
This upgrade will cost ${ xpCost } exper.msgid_plural: This upgrade will cost ${ xpCost } experience.

Two random cards will be chosen among the following choice:

${ upgradeCards }
Two random cards will be chosen among th.msgid_plural:
Two random cards will be chosen among the following choices:

${ upgradeCards }
msgstr:
Zwei zufällige Karten werden aus der folgenden Auswahl ausgewählt:

${ upgradeCards }

Zwei zufällige Karten werden aus der folgenden Auswahl ausgewählt::

${ upgradeCards }

You can edit your collection under Setti.msgid: You can edit your collection under Settings to adjust the eligible choices.
msgstr: Die Sammlung kann unter Einstellungen bearbeitet werden, um die erlaubten Auswahlmöglichkeiten zu verändern.

<b>Additional Options</b>: When you upgr.msgid: Additional Options: When you upgrade a [[Fortune]] or [[Gambit]] card, you may instead pay the full experience cost on the higher level version and leave the lower level version in your deck (it does not count towards your deck size or the number of copies of that card in your deck).
msgstr: Zusätzliche Optionen: Beim Upgrade einer [[Glücksfall]] oder [[Schachzug]] Karte kannst du die vollen Erfahrungspunkte für die Karte mit dem höheren Level ausgeben, um die Karte mit dem niedrigeren Level im Deck zu behalten (sie zählt nicht gegen die Deckgröße oder die Anzahl der Kopien dieser Karte im Deck).

<b>Shrewd Analysis</b>: If you meet the.msgid: Shrewd Analysis: If you meet the campaign conditions, you may use Shrewd Analysis to choose both upgrades randomly and only pay for one. Note: the app handles this by adjusting experience to account for the 'free' upgrade.
msgstr: Scharfsinnige Analyse: Falls die Kampagnenvoraussetzungen erfüllt werden, kann Scharfsinnige Analyse verwendet werden, um beide Upgrades zufällig zu wählen, und nur für eines zu bezahlen. Hinweis: Die App berücksichtig dies indem die Erfahrungspunkte für das 'kostenlose' Upgrade angepasst werden.

Note: this campaign is still being relea.msgid:
Note: this campaign is still being released and so the guide is incomplete (and may contain some mistakes).
As new scenarios are released, I will try to update the app promptly but there may be some slight delays.
msgstr:
Hinweis: Diese Kampagne wird gerade veröffentlicht. Daher ist dieser Leitfaden noch unvollständig (und kann Fehler enthalten).
Sobald neue Szenarien veröffentlicht werden, wird dieser Leitfaden so schnell wie möglich angepasst.

Dissonant Voices is an ongoing project b.msgid: Dissonant Voices is an ongoing project by Mythos Busters to narrate the english scenario text for each Arkham Horror campaign.
msgstr: Dissonant Voices ist ein fortlaufendes Projekt der Mythos Busters, in dem der englische Szenariotext aller Arkham-Horror-Kampagnen erzählt wird.

Are you sure you want to delete this sta.msgid: Are you sure you want to delete this standalone?
msgstr: Bist du sicher, dass du dieses Einzelspielszenario löschen willst?

Don't see your favorite Standalone scena.msgid: Don't see your favorite Standalone scenario here? Let me know at arkhamcards@gmail.com, and I'll see about including it in a future release.
msgstr: Dein Lieblings-Einzelspielszenario ist hier nicht verfügbar? Schreibe eine Mail an arkhamcards@gmail.com und vielleicht wird es in einer zukünftigen Version veröffentlicht.

<b>Additional Options</b>: When you upgr.msgid: Additional Options: When you upgrade a [[Spell]], you may instead pay the full experience cost on the higher level version and leave the lower level version in your deck (it does not count towards your deck size or the number of copies of that card in your deck).
msgstr: Zusätzliche Optionen: Sobald du eine [[Zauber]]-Karte verbesserst, darfst du stattdessen die vollständigen Erfahrungspunktekosten der höherstufigen Version bezahlen und die niedrigstufige Version in deinem Deck behalten (sie zählt nicht gegen deine Deckgröße oder die Anzahl Kopien dieser Karte in deinem Deck).

If you have just completed a scenario, u.msgid: If you have just completed a scenario, use the 'Upgrade' button which will track changes.
msgstr: Wenn du gerade ein Szenario abgeschlossen hast, benutze den 'Verbessern'-Button um die Änderungen zu protokollieren.

Looks like you are trying to undo a deck.msgid:
Looks like you are trying to undo a deck save.

The app will NOT be able to undo these changes, so if you proceed again the changes might be applied twice. You should view the deck and manually undo the edits before reapplying the changes.
msgstr:
Anscheinend versuchst du, das Abspeichern eines Decks rückgängig zu machen.

Die App kann diese Änderungen NICHT rückgängig machen. Solltest du forfahren, könnten die Änderungen doppelt angewandt werden. Du solltest die Bearbeitungen manuell rückgrängig machen, bevor du diese Änderungen erneut anwendest.

It looks like one or more deck changes a.msgid: It looks like one or more deck changes are unsaved.

No results found for search '${ searchRe.msgid: No results found for search '${ searchResults.term }'.

Choose a handle for your account.msgid: Choose a handle for your account
msgstr: Wähle einen Handle für dein Konto

This app works just fine without an acco.msgid:
This app works just fine without an account.
But signing in will allow you to sync campaigns between devices, with more features planned for the future.
msgstr:
Diese App funktioniert auch ohne ein Konto wunderbar.
Eine Anmeldung erlaubt dir, Kampagnen zwischen Geräten zu synchronisieren. Es sind noch weitere Funktionalitäten geplant.

Looks like there is already an account r.msgid: Looks like there is already an account registered with this email address.
msgstr: Anscheinend ist bereits ein Konto mit dieser E-Mail-Adresse registriert.

That doesn't look like a valid email add.msgid: That doesn't look like a valid email address
msgstr: Das sieht nicht wie eine gültige E-Mail-Adresse aus.

That password seems to be too weak..msgid: That password seems to be too weak.

There doesn't appear to be an account wi.msgid: There doesn't appear to be an account with that email address.
msgstr: Anscheinend gibt es kein Konto mit dieser E-Mail-Adresse.

Would you like to create a new account i.msgid: Would you like to create a new account instead?
msgstr: Möchtest du stattdessen ein neues Konto anlegen?

Are you trying to sign in to an existing.msgid: Are you trying to sign in to an existing account?
msgstr: Versuchst du, dich mit einem bestehenden Konto anzumelden?

A password reset email has been sent to.msgid:
A password reset email has been sent to '${ emailAddress }'.

Please follow the instructions and then return to the app to continue.
msgstr:
Eine E-Mail zum Zurücksetzen des Passworts wurde an '${ emailAddress }' gesendet.

Bitte folge den Anweisungen dort und kehre anschließend zur App zurück, um fortzufahren.

Would you like to reset your password vi.msgid: Would you like to reset your password via email?
msgstr: Möchtest du dein Passwort via E-Mail zurücksetzen?

Using an Arkham Cards account will allow.msgid:
Using an Arkham Cards account will allow you to backup and sync your campaign data between devices.
More features are in the works.
msgstr:
Durch ein Arkham-Cards-Konto kannst du deine Kampagnendaten sichern und auf mehreren Geräten synchronisieren.
Zusätzliche Funktionalitäten sind in Arbeit.

If you are having trouble with your acco.msgid:
If you are having trouble with your account you should try to reconnect.

If the problem persists, you may sign out but campaigns will have ArkhamDB decks disconnected.
msgstr:
Bei Problemen mit deinem Konto solltest du versuchen, dich neu anzumelden.

Falls das Problem weiterhin besteht, kannst du dich abmelden. Allerdings verlieren deine Kampagnen die Verbindungen zu ArkhamDB-Decks.

Can't add side scenario right now..msgid: Can't add side scenario right now.
msgstr: Nebenszenario kann jetzt nicht eingefügt werden.

Are you sure you want to sign out of Ark.msgid:
Are you sure you want to sign out of Arkham Cards?

Any campaigns you uploaded or have had shared with you will be removed from this device. They can be resynced if you sign in again.

Note: if you have made recent changes while offline, they may be lost.
msgstr:
Bist du sicher, dass du dich von Arkham Cards abmelden willst?

Alle Kampagnen, die du hochgeladen hast oder die mit dir geteilt wurden, werden von diesem Gerät entfernt. Diese können erneut heruntergeladen werden, wenn du dich wieder anmeldest.

Anmerkung: Falls du vor kurzem offline Änderungen vorgenommen hast, können diese verloren gehen.

You must specify a name for custom campa.msgid: You must specify a name for custom campaigns.

This feature is intended for advanced di.msgid: This feature is intended for advanced diagnostics. Just copy the data presented here and email it to arkhamcards@gmail.com
msgstr: Diese Funktionalität ist für detaillierte Diagnostik gedacht. Kopiere einfach die hier gezeigten Daten in eine E-Mail an arkhamcards@gmail.com

This should only take a few seconds and.msgid: This should only take a few seconds and no network is required.
msgstr: Dies sollte nur ein paar Sekunden dauern und benötigt keine Netzwerkverbindung.

If you run into any problems with this m.msgid: If you run into any problems with this migration, please contact arkhamcards@gmail.com.
msgstr: Falls bei dieser Migration irgendwelche Probleme auftreten, kontaktiere bitte arkhamcards@gmail.com.

Campaigns can be uploaded to your Arkham.msgid: Campaigns can be uploaded to your Arkham Cards account.
msgstr: Kampagnen können zu deinem Arkham-Cards-Konto hochgeladen werden.

Uploaded campaigns will be synced betwee.msgid: Uploaded campaigns will be synced between devices.
msgstr: Hochgeladene Kampagnen werden zwischen Geräten synchronisiert.

Decks with Ancestral Knowledge must incl.msgid: Decks with Ancestral Knowledge must include at least 10 skills.
msgstr: Decks mit Wissen der Ahnen müssen mindestens 10 Fertigkeiten enthalten.

This appears to be one of your decks fro.msgid: This appears to be one of your decks from ArkhamDB, however you are not currently logged in. If you wish to make edits, please login through the app settings.
msgstr: Dies scheint eines deiner Decks auf ArkhamDB zu sein, allerdings bist du gerade nicht angemeldet. Wenn du Änderungen vornehmen willst, melde dich bitte vorher in den App-Einstellungen an.

Are you sure you want to leave this camp.msgid:
Are you sure you want to leave this campaign?

Your decks will be removed from the campaign, but you can rejoin it later.
msgstr:
Bist du dir sicher, dass du die Kampagne verlassen möchtest?

Deine Decks werden aus der Kampagne entfernt, aber du kannst später wieder beitreten.

Are you sure you want to leave this stan.msgid:
Are you sure you want to leave this standalone?

Your decks will be removed from the standalone, but you can rejoin it later.
msgstr:
Bist du dir sicher, dass du dieses Einzelszenario verlassen möchtest?

Deine Decks werden aus dem Einzelszenario entfernt, aber du kannst später wieder beitreten.

You must be online to upload.msgid: You must be online to upload
msgstr: Du musst online sein, um hochzuladen

This appears to be one of your decks fro.msgid: This appears to be one of your decks from ArkhamDB, however you seem to be logged into a different ArkhamDB account? If you wish to make edits, please login through the app settings.
msgstr: Dies scheint eines deiner Decks auf ArkhamDB zu sein, allerdings scheinst du mit einem anderen ArkhamDB-Konto angemeldet? Wenn du Änderungen vornehmen möchtest, melde dich bitte in den App-Einstellungen an.

Thanks for signing up for Arkham Cards.\.msgid:
Thanks for signing up for Arkham Cards.

First of all, you'll need to create a handle for your account.
msgstr:
Danke, dass du dich bei Arkham Cards anmeldest.

Zuerst musst du dir ein Handle für dein Konto erstellen.

People will be able to search for friend.msgid: People will be able to search for friends using their handle so you can join their campaigns.
msgstr: Leute können mit deren Handle nach Freunden suchen, so dass du ihren Kampagnen beitreten kannst.

Now that you are signed in, you should h.msgid: Now that you are signed in, you should have access to your saved campaigns.
msgstr: Jetzt wo du angemeldet bist solltest du Zugriff auf deine gespeicherten Kampagnen haben.

Campaigns can now be 'uploaded' so they.msgid: Campaigns can now be 'uploaded' so they can be synced between devices or shared with friends.
msgstr: Kampagnen können jetzt 'hochgeladen' und so zwischen Geräten synchronisiert oder mit Freunden geteilt werden.

If you are a custom content creator who.msgid: If you are a custom content creator who has a "finished" campaign you'd like to see in the app, contact me at arkhamcards@gmail.com. Custom campaigns are a fair amount of work, but I'd love to support the community in anyway I can.
msgstr: Falls du eine "abgeschlossene" Fan-Kampagne erstellt hast, die du gerne in dieser App sehen möchtest, kontaktiere mich unter arkhamcards@gmail.com. Fan-Kampagnien sind viel Arbeit, aber ich möchte die Community gerne auf jede mir mögliche Art unterstützen.

You cannot have more than 5 cards that a.msgid: You cannot have more than 5 cards that are not Guardian or Neutral
msgstr: Du kannst nicht mehr als 5 Karten haben die nicht Wächter oder Neutral sind

You cannot have more than 5 cards that a.msgid: You cannot have more than 5 cards that are not Seeker or Neutral
msgstr: Du kannst nicht mehr als 5 Karten haben die nicht Sucher oder Neutral sind

msgstr: Du kannst nicht mehr als 5 Karten haben die nicht Schurke oder Neutral sind

msgstr: Du kannst nicht mehr als 5 Karten haben die nicht Mystiker oder Neutral sind

You cannot have more than 5 cards that a.msgid: You cannot have more than 5 cards that are not Survivor or Neutral
msgstr: Du kannst nicht mehr als 5 Karten haben die nicht Überlebender oder Neutral sind

You must have at least 7 cards from 3 di.msgid: You must have at least 7 cards from 3 different factions
msgstr: Du musst mindestens 7 Karten von 3 verschiedenen Klassen haben

You cannot have more than 15 level 0-1 S.msgid: You cannot have more than 15 level 0-1 Seeker and/or Mystic cards
msgstr: Du kannst nicht mehr als 15 Stufe 0-1 Sucher- und/oder Mystikerkarten haben

You cannot have more than 5 Guardian and.msgid: You cannot have more than 5 Guardian and/or Mystic cards
msgstr: Du kannst nicht mehr als 5 Wächter- und/oder Mystikerkarten haben

msgstr: Du kannst nicht mehr als 5 Stufe 0 Mystikerkarten haben

When you have finished making adjustment.msgid: When you have finished making adjustments, press the 'Save' button to record your changes.
msgstr: Wenn du mit deinen Anpassungen fertig bist, drücke 'Speichern' um deine Änderungen zu sichern.

This deck will be upgraded with XP and a.msgid: This deck will be upgraded with XP and any new story cards will be added or removed as specified.
msgstr: Dieses Deck wird mit XP verbessert und jegliche neuen Storykarten werden wie angegeben hinzugefügt oder entfernt.

This investigator does not have a deck a.msgid:
This investigator does not have a deck associated with it.
If you choose a deck, the app can help track spent experience, story asset changes, and deckbuilding requirements.
msgstr:
Dieser Ermittler hat kein zugewiesenes Deck.
Falls du ein Deck auswählst, hilft dir die App, ausgebene Erfahrungspunkte, Storyvorteile, Änderungen und Deckbaubestimmungen zu verwalten.

Now that your upgrade has been saved, wh.msgid: Now that your upgrade has been saved, when visiting the deck be sure to use the 'Edit' button when making card changes.
msgstr: Jetzt wo deine Verbesserungen gespeichert wurden, nutze den 'Bearbeiten'-Button zum Verändern von Karten, wenn du das Deck aufrufst.

What exactly does the app handle?.msgid: What exactly does the app handle?

Generally speaking, the app handles anyt.msgid:
Generally speaking, the app handles anything that you see mentioned in the digital campaign log.
If you are building your deck with the app, it will also handle cards like Arcane Research and Shrewd Analysis (if you allow the app to randomize your upgrades).
If you find that you made a mistake after you upgraded your deck, you can 'adjust' the available experience when editing a deck.
msgstr:
Allgemein gesagt verwaltet die App alles was im digitalen Kampagnenlogbuch erwähnt wird.
Falls du dein Deck mit der App baust, verwaltet sie auch Karten wie Arkane Forschung und Scharfsinnige Analyse (falls du der App erlaubst, deine Verbesserungen zufällig zu verteilen).
Wenn dir auffällt, dass du bei einer Deckverbesserung einen Fehler gemacht hast, kannst du im Nachhinein die verfügbaren Erfahrungspunkte neu zuweisen.

The numbers below already include all th.msgid:
The numbers below already include all the trauma, victory points, and story assets you may have earned during the resolution.

If you have any other cards or effects that the app does not take care of, you can make adjustments below before saving each investigator.
msgstr:
Die Zahlen unten beinhalten bereits alle Traumata, Siegpunkte und Storyvorteilskarten die du in der Auflösung bekommen haben könntest.

Wenn du andere Karten oder Effekte nutzt, die die App nicht verarbeitet, kannst du unten Anpassungen vornehmen, bevor du jeden Ermittler speicherst.

Random weaknesses will be drawn that mat.msgid: Random weaknesses will be drawn that match these traits.
msgstr: Es werden zufällige Schwächen gezogen, die diese Merkmale besitzen.

In your Campaign Log, under \"${ section.msgid: In your Campaign Log, under "${ section }", record #name#.
msgstr: Im Kampagnenlogbuch unter "${ section }" wird notiert #name#.

msgstr: Im Kampagnenlogbuch unter "${ logEntry.section }" wird ${ logEntry.text } durchgestrichen.

msgstr: Im Kampagnenlogbuch unter "${ logEntry.section }" wird ${ logEntry.text } notiert

msgstr: Du darfst nicht mehr als 5 Level 0 Überlebender Karten haben

msgstr:

msgstr: Streiche im Abschnitt ${ sectionName } im Kampagnenlogbuch ${ partnerName } durch,

In the ${ sectionName } section of the C.msgid: In the ${ sectionName } section of the Campaign Log, write "MIA" next to ${ partnerName }.
msgstr: Füge im Abschnitt ${ sectionName } im Kampagnenlogbuch neben ${ partnerName } ein "Vermisst" hinzu.

In the ${ sectionName } section of the C.msgid: In the ${ sectionName } section of the Campaign Log, cross out "MIA" next to ${ partnerName }.
msgstr: Streiche im Abschnitt ${ sectionName } im Kampagnenlogbuch neben ${ partnerName } das "Vermisst" durch.

If the lead investigator was driven <b>i.msgid: If the lead investigator was driven insane.

If the lead investigator is still alive..msgid: If the lead investigator is still alive.
msgstr: Falls der Ermittlungsleiter noch am Leben ist.

If all investigatore are still alive..msgid: If all investigatore are still alive.
msgstr: Falls alle Ermittler noch am Leben sind.

A side-story is a scenario that may be p.msgid: A side-story is a scenario that may be played between any two scenarios of an Arkham Horror: The Card Game campaign. - Playing a side-story costs each investigator in the campaign a certain amount of experience, which should be paid when you start the scenario. - Weaknesses, trauma, experience, and rewards granted by playing a side-story stay with the investigators for the remainder of the campaign. - Each side-story may only be played once per campaign. Note: When using this app, the experience required to play these scenarios will be deducted automatically at the end of the scenario, but you should be sure you have sufficient experience set aside to pay for it.
msgstr: Eine Nebengeschichte ist ein Szenario, das zwischen zwei beliebigen Szenarien einer Kampagne von Arkham Horror: Das Kartenspiel gespielt werden kann. - Das Spielen einer Nebengeschichte kostet jeden Ermittler in der Kampagne eine bestimmte Menge Erfahrungspunkte. - Die Ermittler behalten Schwächen, Traumata, Erfahrungspunkte und Belohnungen für das Spielen einer Nebengeschichte für den Rest der Kampagne. - Jede Nebengeschichte darf nur ein Mal pro Kampagne gespielt werden. Hinweis: Bei Verwendung der App werden die erforderlichen Erfahrungspunkte automatisch am Ende des Szenarios abgezogen, aber du solltest sicherstellen, dass du bereits über genügend Erfahrungspunkte verfügst, um dies zu begleichen.
Das Herz des Wahnsinns, Teil I
Das Herz des Wahnsinns, Teil II

The Heart of Madness - Seals Placed.msgid: The Heart of Madness - Seals Placed
msgstr: Das Herz des Wahnsinns - Eingesetzte Siegel

The Heart of Madness - Seals Recovered.msgid: The Heart of Madness - Seals Recovered
msgstr: Das Herz des Wahnsinns - Geborgene Siegel

You may heal 1 physical or mental trauma.msgid: You may heal 1 physical or mental trauma (your choice)
msgstr: Du darfst 1 körperliches oder seelisches Trauma (deine Wahl) heilen

In the ${ sectionName } section of the C.msgid: In the ${ sectionName } section of the Campaign Log, draw a check mark next to ${ partnerName }.
msgstr: Füge im Abschnitt ${ sectionName } im Kampagnenlogbuch neben ${ partnerName } einen Haken hinzu.

This deck is owned by another player. Yo.msgid: This deck is owned by another player. You can record the upgrade now and they will be given an opportunity to save the changes to their deck when they next open the app.
msgstr: Dieses Deck gehört einem anderen Spieler. Du kannst die Verbesserungen jetzt speichern und dann werden dem Besitzer die Änderungen beim nächsten Appstart angezeigt.

Changes have been recorded. You can appl.msgid: Changes have been recorded. You can apply these changes to your deck on the main screen of the campaign under your investigator.
msgstr: Änderungen gespeichert. Du kannst diese Änderungen auf dem Hauptbildschirm der Kampagne unter deinem Ermittler anwenden.

Changes have been recorded. The owner of.msgid: Changes have been recorded. The owner of this deck can apply these changes to their deck on the main screen of the campaign under their investigator.
msgstr: Änderungen gespeichert. Der Besitzer dieses Decks kann die Änderungen auf dem Hauptbildschirm der Kampagne unter seinem Ermittler anwenden.

Which tarot card is impacting the chaos.msgid: Which tarot card is impacting the chaos bag?

Replace highest non-negative token with.msgid: Replace highest non-negative token with a skull.
msgstr: Ersetze den höchsten nicht-negativen Marker durch einen Totenschädel.

Replace a skull with a 0 token..msgid: Replace a skull with a 0 token.

msgstr: Das Gericht · XX (auf dem Kopf stehend)

Each investigator not defeated during th.msgid: Each investigator not defeated during this game earns +2 experience during its resolution.
msgstr: Jeder in diesem Spiel nicht besiegte Ermittler verdient während der Auflösung +2 Erfahrung.

Each investigator defeated during this g.msgid: Each investigator defeated during this game earns -2 experience during its resolution.
msgstr: Jeder in diesem Spiel  besiegte Ermittler verdient während der Auflösung -2 Erfahrung.

Each investigator begins the game with 3.msgid: Each investigator begins the game with 3 addititonal resources
msgstr: Jeder Ermittler beginnt das Spiel mit 3 zusätzlichen Ressourcen.

Each investigator begins the game with 3.msgid: Each investigator begins the game with 3 fewer resources, and cannot gain resources during their first turn.
msgstr: Jeder Ermittler beginnt das Spiel mit 3 Ressourcen weniger und kann in seinem ersten Zug keine Ressourcen erhalten.

During the first [intellect] test each i.msgid: During the first [intellect] test each investigator performs each round, they get +1 [intellect].
msgstr: Während der ersten [intellect]-Fertigkeitsprobe, die jeder Ermittler in seiner Runde durchführt, bekommt er +1 [intellect].

During the first [intellect] test each i.msgid: During the first [intellect] test each investigator performs each round, they get -1 [intellect].
msgstr: Während der ersten [intellect]-Fertigkeitsprobe, die jeder Ermittler in seiner Runde durchführt, bekommt er -1 [intellect].

During the first [agility] test each inv.msgid: During the first [agility] test each investigator performs each round, they get +1 [agility].
msgstr: Während der ersten [agility]-Fertigkeitsprobe, die jeder Ermittler in seiner Runde durchführt, bekommt er +1 [agility].

During the first [agility] test each inv.msgid: During the first [agility] test each investigator performs each round, they get -1 [agility].
msgstr: Während der ersten [agility]-Fertigkeitsprobe, die jeder Ermittler in seiner Runde durchführt, bekommt er -1 [agility].

During the first [combat] test each inve.msgid: During the first [combat] test each investigator performs each round, they get +1 [combat].
msgstr: Während der ersten [combat]-Fertigkeitsprobe, die jeder Ermittler in seiner Runde durchführt, bekommt er +1 [combat].

During the first [combat] test each inve.msgid: During the first [combat] test each investigator performs each round, they get -1 [combat].
msgstr: Während der ersten [combat]-Fertigkeitsprobe, die jeder Ermittler in seiner Runde durchführt, bekommt er -1 [combat].

During the first [willpower] test each i.msgid: During the first [willpower] test each investigator performs each round, they get +1 [willpower].
msgstr: Während der ersten [willpower]-Fertigkeitsprobe, die jeder Ermittler in seiner Runde durchführt, bekommt er +1 [willpower].

During the first [willpower] test each i.msgid: During the first [willpower] test each investigator performs each round, they get -1 [willpower].
msgstr: Während der ersten [willpower]-Fertigkeitsprobe, die jeder Ermittler in seiner Runde durchführt, bekommt er -1 [willpower].

When the game begins, each investigator.msgid: When the game begins, each investigator searches their deck for an Ally asset, adds it to their hand, and shuffles their deck.
msgstr: Sobald das Spiel beginnt, durchsucht jeder Ermittler sein Deck nach einer Verbündeter-Vorteilskarte, fügt sie seiner Hand hinzu und mischt sein Deck.

When the game begins, each investigator.msgid: When the game begins, each investigator searches their deck for an Ally asset, removes it from the game, and shuffles their deck.
msgstr: Sobald das Spiel beginnt, durchsucht jeder Ermittler sein Deck nach einer Verbündeter-Vorteilskarte, entfernt sie aus dem Spiel und mischt sein Deck.

Each investigator begins the game with 2.msgid: Each investigator begins the game with 2 additional cards in their opening hand.
msgstr: Jeder Ermittler beginnt das Spiel mit 2 zusätzlichen Karten auf seiner Starthand.

Each investigator begins the game with 2.msgid: Each investigator begins the game with 2 fewer cards in their opening hand, and cannot draw cards during their first turn.
msgstr: Jeder Ermittler beginnt das Spiel mit 2 Karten weniger auf seiner Starthand und kann in seinem ersten Zug keine Karten ziehen.

When the game begins, each investigator.msgid: When the game begins, each investigator may play an asset from their hand at -2 cost.
msgstr: Sobald das Spiel beginnt, darf jeder Ermittler eine Vorteilskarte für -2 Kosten von seiner Hand spielen.

During the first round of the game, each.msgid: During the first round of the game, each investigator cannot play assets.
msgstr: In der ersten Runde des Spiels können die Ermittler keine Vorteilskarten spielen.

Increase each investigator's maximum han.msgid: Increase each investigator's maximum hand size by 3.
msgstr: Das Handkartenlimit jedes Ermittlers wird um 3 erhöht.

Decrease each investigator's maximum han.msgid: Decrease each investigator's maximum hand size by 3.
msgstr: Das Handkartenlimit jedes Ermittlers wird um 3 gesenkt.

Once each act, when an investigator reve.msgid: Once each act, when an investigator reveals an [auto_fail] token, thte investigator may cancel it and treat it as a 0 token instead.
msgstr: Ein Mal pro Szene dürfen die Ermittler, sobald ein beliebiger Ermittler einen [auto_fail]-Marker enthüllt, ihn aufheben und ihn stattdessen als einen "0"-Marker behandeln.

Once each agenda, the first time any inv.msgid: Once each agenda, the first time any investigator reveals an [elder_sign] token, cancel it and treat it as a -5 token instead.
msgstr: Ein Mal pro Agenda wird, sobald ein beliebiger Ermittler zum ersten Mal einen [elder_sign]-Marker enthüllt, der Marker aufgehoben und und stattdessen als ein "-5"-Marker behandelt.

Cancel the first doom that would be plac.msgid: Cancel the first doom that would be placed on the final agenda of the game.
msgstr: Das erste Verderben, das auf der letzten Agenda des Spiels platziert werden würde, wird aufgehoben.

The final agenda of the game enters play.msgid: The final agenda of the game enters play with 1 doom on it.
msgstr: Die letzte Agenda des Spiels kommt mit 1 Verderben zusätzlich ins Spiel.

During setup, each investigator may take.msgid: During setup, each investigator may take up to 2 additional mulligans.
msgstr: Während der Vorbereitung darf jeder Ermittler bis zu 2 zusätzliche Mulligans nehmen.

Each investigator cannot mulligan or rep.msgid: Each investigator cannot mulligan or replace weaknesses in their opening hand (resolve their revelation abilities when the game begins).
msgstr: Die Ermittler können keinen Mulligan nehmen und ihre Schwächen auf ihrer Starthand nicht ersetzen (ihre Enthüllung-Fähigkeiten werden abgehandelt, sobald das Spiel beginnt).

Each investigator has 1 additional slot.msgid: Each investigator has 1 additional slot of a type chosen by that investigattor when the game begins.
msgstr: Jeder Ermittler hat 1 zusätzlichen Slot für eine Slotart, die er wählt, sobald das Spiel beginnt.

Each investigator has 3 fewer slots, eac.msgid: Each investigator has 3 fewer slots, each of a different type, chosen by that investigator when the game begins.
msgstr: Jeder Ermittler hat 3 Slots weniger, die er wählt, sobald das Spiel beginnt, jeder davon von einer unterschiedlichen Slotart.

Each investigator chooses 1 basic weakne.msgid: Each investigator chooses 1 basic weakness in their deck and removes it from the game (return them after the game ends).
msgstr: Jeder Ermittler wählt 1 Grundschwäche aus seinem Deck und entfernt sie aus dem Spiel (am Endes des Spiels kehrt sie in sein Deck zurück).

Add 1 random basic weakness to each inve.msgid: Add 1 random basic weakness to each investigator's deck. Remove them after the game ends.
msgstr: Jeder Ermittler fügt seinem Deck 1 zufällige Grundschwäche hinzu (Am Ende des Spiels wird sie aus dem Deck entfernt).

After an investigator reveals an [elder_.msgid: After an investigator reveals an [elder_sign] token during a skill test, they may heal 1 damage or 1 horror.
msgstr: Nachdem ein Ermittler während einer Fertigkeitsprobe einen [elder_sign]-Marker enthüllt hat, darf er 1 Schaden und 1 Horror heilen.

After an investigator reveals an [auto_f.msgid: After an investigator reveals an [auto_fail] token during a skill test, they must either take 1 damage or 1 horror.
msgstr: Nachdem ein Ermittler während einer Fertigkeitsprobe einen [auto_fail]-Marker enthüllt hat, muss er entweder 1 Schaden oder 1 Horror nehmen.

The first time each investigator's deck.msgid: The first time each investigator's deck would run out of cards, they may shuffle the bottom 10 cards of their discard pile back into their deck.
msgstr: Würde das Deck eines Ermittlers das erste Mal leer werden, darf der Ermittler die untersten 10 Karten seines Ablagestapels zurück in sein Deck mischen.

When the game begins, each investigator.msgid: When the game begins, each investigator discards the top 5 cards of their deck. Shuffle each discarded weakness into its owner's deck.
msgstr: Sobald das Spiel beginnt, legt jeder Ermittler die obersten 5 Karten seines Decks ab. Abgelegte Schwächen werden ins Deck des Besitzer gemischt.

During each investigator's first turn, t.msgid: During each investigator's first turn, they may take 2 additional actions.
msgstr: Jeder Ermittler darf in seinem ersten Zug 2 zusätzliche Aktionen nehmen.

During each investigator's first turn, t.msgid: During each investigator's first turn, they have 2 fewer actions to take.
msgstr: Jeder Ermittler hat in seinem ersten Zug 2 Aktionen weniger, die er nehmen kann.

When the game begins, replace a [skull].msgid: When the game begins, replace a [skull] token in the chaos bag with a 0 token. Swap them back after the game ends.
msgstr: Sobald das Spiel beginnt, wird ein [skull]-Marker im Chaosbeutel durch einen "0"-Marker ersetzt. Am Ende des Spiels werden sie wieder getauscht.

When the game begins, replace the highes.msgid: When the game begins, replace the highest non-negative token in the chaos bag with a [skull] token. Swap them back after the game ends.
msgstr: Sobald das Spiel beginnt, wird der höchste nicht-negative Marker im Chaosbeutel durch einen [skull]-Marker ersetzt. Am Ende des Spiels werden sie wieder getauscht.

Each investigator not defeated during th.msgid: Each investigator not defeated during this game may remove 1 trauma of their choice during its resolution.
msgstr: Jeder in diesem Spiel nicht besiegte Ermittler darf während der Auflösung 1 Trauma seiner Wahl entfernen.

Each investigator defeated during this g.msgid: Each investigator defeated during this game suffers 1 trauma of their choice during its resolution.
msgstr: Jeder in diesem Spiel besiegte Ermittler erleidet während der Auflösung 1 Trauma seiner Wahl.

An app update is required to access this.msgid: An app update is required to access this campaign.
msgstr: Die App muss aktualisiert werden, um Zugang zu dieser Kampagne zu erhalten.

Note that this is an ArkhamCards account.msgid: Note that this is an ArkhamCards account, which is separate from your ArkhamDB account.
msgstr: Hinweis: Dies ist ein ArkhamCards-Konto, welches unabhängig von deinem ArkhamDB-Konto ist.

Campaign will be synced between devices.msgid: Campaign will be synced between devices and can be shared with friends
msgstr: Kampagne wird zwischen Geräten synchronisiert und kann mit Freunden geteilt werden

Campaign will be local to this device, y.msgid: Campaign will be local to this device, you can choose to upload it later
msgstr: Kampagne wird lokal auf dem Gerät erstellt, du kannst sie später hochladen

The total number of these cards among de.msgid: The total number of these cards among decks from this campaign exceeds your card collection.
msgstr: Die Gesamtzahl dieser Karten in den Decks dieser Kampagne übersteigt deine Kartensammlung.

You appear to be offline. Tap to check f.msgid: You appear to be offline. Tap to check for network.
msgstr: Du scheinst offline zu sein. Klicke um die Konnektivität zu prüfen.

Apply changes from last completed scenar.msgid: Apply changes from last completed scenario
msgstr: Wende Änderungen aus dem zuletzt abgeschlossenen Szenario an

Note: This should only be selected at de.msgid: Note: This should only be selected at deck creation time, not between scenarios.
msgstr: Hinweis: Dies sollte beim Erstellen eines Decks ausgewählt werden, nicht zwischen Szenarien.

The information presented in this app ab.msgid:
The information presented in this app about Arkham Horror: The Card Game, both literal and graphical, is copyrighted by Fantasy Flight Games. This app is not produced, endorsed, supported, or affiliated with Fantasy Flight Games.

This application was created by Daniel Salinas as a fan project to help support the Arkham Horror: The Card Game community, with design from ${ visualDesigner } and additional development by ${ dissonantVoicesDeveloper }, ${ chaosBagDeveloper }, and ${ toolingDeveloper }. If you find yourself managing lots of decks and campaigns, I'm hoping it proves useful.

Feedback and bug reports are welcome by email at [arkhamcards@gmail.com](mailto:arkhamcards@gmail.com)

Many thanks to ArkhamDB.com for providing the structured data, API access and access to card images. Without their continued support, this project wouldn't be possible.

msgstr: Übersetzungen: • Spanisch: ${ spanishTranslators } • Französisch: ${ frenchTranslators } • Deutsch: ${ germanTranslators } • Russisch: ${ russianTranslators } • Koreanisch: ${ koreanTranslators }

msgstr: Weitere Beiträge: • Visuelles Design: ${ visualDesigner } • Digitaler Chaosbeutel + Wahrscheinlichkeitsrechner: ${ chaosBagDeveloper } • Audiointegration von Dissonant Voices: ${ dissonantVoicesDeveloper } • Tooling und Build Support: ${ toolingDeveloper }

Login required to save deck upgrade.msgid: Login required to save deck upgrade
msgstr: Login vonnöten um die Deck Verbesserungen zu speichern

Note: this campaign is a fairly new addi.msgid: Note: this campaign is a fairly new addition to the app and may contain some mistakes.
msgstr: Hinweis: Dieser Kampagne ist erst kürzlich neu hinzugefügt worden und kann noch Fehler enthalten.

Show all available cards for parallel.msgid: Show all available cards for parallel
msgstr: Zeige alle verfügbaren Karten von Parallel

Signing into Arkham Cards will let you b.msgid: Signing into Arkham Cards will let you backup your campaigns between your devices and share in-progress campaigns with other friends.
msgstr: Wenn du dich in Arkham Cards anmeldest, kannst du deinen Kampagnen zwischen deinen Geräten synchronisieren und angefangenen Kampagnen mit deinen Freunden teilen.
Lerne mehr über die neusten Funktionalitäten

Using an Arkham Cards account will allow.msgid:
Using an Arkham Cards account will allow you to backup and sync your campaign data between devices.

You can also upload in-progress campaigns and share them with friends and even share a synchronized chaos bag.
msgstr:
Wenn du einen Arkham Cards Konto benuzt, kannst du deinen Kampagnen zwischen deinen Geräten synchronisieren.

Du kannst dann auch angefangenen Kampagnen hochladen, mit deinen Freunden teilen und sogar den Chaosbeutel mit ihnen synchronisieren

Sync campaigns to share with friends.msgid: Sync campaigns to share with friends
msgstr: Synchronisiere Kampagnen um sie mit Freunden zu teilen

Did you know campaigns can be shared wit.msgid: Did you know campaigns can be shared with friends using this app?
msgstr: Wusstest du, dass du Kampagnen mit Freunden teilen kannst?

This deck contains new cards that the ap.msgid:
This deck contains new cards that the app hasn't seen before.

Please go to the 'Settings' tab and choose 'Check ArkhamDB for updates.'

When it is finished, you can try to load the deck again.
msgstr:
Dieses Deck enthält Karten, die die App noch nie gesehen hat.

Bitte gehe in den 'Einstellungen' Reiter und wähle 'Prüfe Verfügbarkeit von neuen Karten'.

Wenn dies abgeschlossen ist, kannst du versuchen das Deck neu zu laden.

- Adjust your card collection in the app.msgid: - Adjust your card collection in the app settings.
msgstr: - Passe deine Kartensammlung in den App Einstellungen an.

- Remove the parallel investigator choic.msgid: - Remove the parallel investigator choice, which might require a larger card collection.
msgstr: - Entferne die Parallel Ermittler Auswahl, diese benötigt vielleicht eine größere Kartensammlung.

- Remove the taboo list, which removes s.msgid: - Remove the taboo list, which removes some card options.
msgstr: - Entferne die Tabuliste, welche einige Kartenoptionen entfernt.

Suggested starter deck for this investig.msgid: Suggested starter deck for this investigator from FFG.
msgstr: Empfohlenes Anfängerdeck für diesen Ermittler von FFG.

Sorry, the app cannot generate random de.msgid: Sorry, the app cannot generate random decks for this investigator yet.
msgstr: Tut mir Leid, für diesen Ermittler kann die App derzeit kein zufallsgeneriertes Deck erzeugen.

Disable to choose which packs to draft f.msgid: Disable to choose which packs to draft from
msgstr: Deaktivieren die Auswahlmöglichkeit von welchen Packs gedraftet werden soll

This deck is currently invalid in some w.msgid: This deck is currently invalid in some way. Please address the issues before continuing the draft.
msgstr: Dieses Deck ist derzeit ungültig. Bitte löse den Konflikt vor dem fortfahren mit dem Draft.

This tool lets you build a deck progress.msgid: This tool lets you build a deck progressively, choosing one card at a time from a limited set of cards.
msgstr: Mit diesem Tool kannst du schrittweise ein Deck zusammenstellen, indem du jeweils eine Karte aus einem begrenzten Kartensatz auswählst.

Each 'hand' of cards is taken at random.msgid: Each 'hand' of cards is taken at random from all possible cards that are allowed given the current investigator + deckbuilding option choices you have made.
msgstr: Jede 'Hand' an Karten wird zufällig aus allen möglichen Karten ausgewählt, die angesichts der aktuellen Ermittler- und Deckbauoptionsauswahl, die du getroffen hast, zulässig sind.

The drafting process will continue until.msgid: The drafting process will continue until your deck is full, but you can stop or change the settings at any time
msgstr: Der Draftvorgang wird fortgesetzt, bis dein Deck voll ist. Du können die Einstellungen jedoch jederzeit stoppen oder ändern

This deck currently contains one or more.msgid:
This deck currently contains one or more forbidden cards.

Please address these outstanding deck issues before drafting cards.
msgstr:
Das Deck enthält derzeit verbotene Karten.

Bitte korrigiere die offenen Deck Konflikte, vor dem draften.

This deck is full.\n\nRemove some cards.msgid:
This deck is full.

Remove some cards or create a new deck if you would like to draft.

At the moment it is only possible to draft level 0 cards using the app.
msgstr:
Dieses Deck ist voll.

Entferne ein paar Karten oder erstelle ein neues Deck wenn du Karten draften möchtest.

Im Moment kann man in der App nur Stufe 0 Karten draften.

A single core set is always included.msgid: A single core set is always included

If you are using the digital chaos bag i.msgid: If you are using the digital chaos bag in the app, be sure to enable the tarot option on the chaos bag screen.
msgstr: Wenn du den digitalen Chaosbeutel in der App nutzt, aktiviere unbedingt die Tarot-Option auf dem Chaosbeutel-Screen.

Perform readings with the tarot deck.msgid: Perform readings with the tarot deck
msgstr: Führen Lesungen mit dem Tarot Deck durch
Wähle zwei Karten die umgedreht werden

Reverse half of the cards (rounded up)..msgid: Reverse half of the cards (rounded up).
msgstr: Drehe die Hälfte der Karten (aufgerundet) um.

Draw and reverse cards however you like!.msgid: Draw and reverse cards however you like!
msgstr: Ziehe und drehe Karten wie du möchtest!

A single card in a random position..msgid: A single card in a random position.
msgstr: Eine einzige Karte in zufälliger Position.

Two cards, one upright and one reversed..msgid: Two cards, one upright and one reversed.
msgstr: Zwei Karten, eine aufrecht und eine umgedreht.

Reveal three upright cards, choose two t.msgid: Reveal three upright cards, choose two to reverse.
msgstr: Enthülle drei aufrechte Karten und drehe zwei nach deiner Wahl um.

A reading for the full campaign..msgid: A reading for the full campaign.
msgstr: Eine Lesung für die ganze Kampagne.

You must flip all cards to reveal your f.msgid: You must flip all cards to reveal your fate.
msgstr: Du musst alle Karten wenden um dein Schicksal zu enthüllen.

Too many card reversed (${ currentRevers.msgid: Too many card reversed (${ currentReversedCount } / ${ requiredReversedCount })
msgstr: Zu viele Karten umgedreht (${ currentReversedCount } / ${ requiredReversedCount })

Not enough cards reversed (${ currentRev.msgid: Not enough cards reversed (${ currentReversedCount } / ${ requiredReversedCount })
msgstr: Nicht genug Karten umgedreht (${ currentReversedCount } / ${ requiredReversedCount })

Are you sure that you want to <b>permane.msgid: Are you sure that you want to permanently delete your account? This cannot be undone.
msgstr: Bist du sicher, dass du dein Konto permanent löschen möchtest? Dies kann nicht mehr rückgängig gemacht werden.

You are currently signed in as <b>${ han.msgid: You are currently signed in as ${ handle }.
msgstr: Du bist derzeit als ${ handle } angemeldet.

Deine Decks werden entfernt aus den ${ joinedCampaignCount } Kampagnen deines Freundes, an den du teilgenommen hast:

I understand that all data will be delet.msgid: I understand that all data will be deleted permanently.
msgstr: Ich verstehe das alle Daten unumkehrbar gelöscht werden.

If you choose to delete this account, th.msgid: If you choose to delete this account, the following data will be removed.
msgstr: Wenn du dich dazu entscheidest dieses Konto zu löschen, werden folgende Daten gelöscht.

The campaign that you have uploaded to t.msgid: The campaign that you have uploaded to this account will be deleted:
The campaign that you have uploaded to t.msgid_plural: The ${ createdCampaignCount } campaigns that you have uploaded to this account will be deleted:
msgstr: Die Kampagne, welche du mit diesem Konto hochgeladen hast, werden gelöscht:
Die ${ createdCampaignCount } Kampagnen, welche du mit diesem Konto hochgeladen hast, werden gelöscht:

Sorry, the app cannot yet support custom.msgid:
Sorry, the app cannot yet support customizable cards like this one, but we are working on it!

Please check for pending app updates and try again later.
msgstr:
Tut mir Leid, die App unterstützt anpassbare Karten wie diese derzeit nicht, aber wir arbeiten daran!

Bitte gucke regelmäßig nach App Updates.

msgstr: ${ investigator.name } Fan-Made Challenge Szenario von ${ scenario.custom.creator }

A side-story is a scenario that may be p.msgid: A side-story is a scenario that may be played between any two scenarios of an Arkham Horror: The Card Game campaign. - Because you are playing The Scarlet Keys campaign, a side-story costs a certain amount of time instead of experience. - Weaknesses, trauma, experience, and rewards granted by playing a side-story stay with the investigators for the remainder of the campaign. - Each side-story may only be played once per campaign.
msgstr: Eine Nebengeschichte ist ein Szenario, das zwischen zwei beliebigen Szenarien einer Kampagne von Arkham Horror: Das Kartenspiel gespielt werden kann. - Weil du die Kampagne Die Scharlachroten Schlüssel spielst, kostet eine Nebengeschichte eine bestimmte Menge Zeit anstatt Erfahrungspunkte. - Die Ermittler behalten Schwächen, Traumata, Erfahrungspunkte und Belohnungen für das Spielen einer Nebengeschichte für den Rest der Kampagne. - Jede Nebengeschichte darf nur ein Mal pro Kampagne gespielt werden.

Starting with this release, there is a n.msgid: Starting with this release, there is a new setting to unlock some 'unofficial' content when searching for cards and building decks. While fan-made campaigns have been available for some time, the cards associated with them have not been searchable. To start, this includes the cards released as part of the Barkham Horror promotional set, as well as the excellent Alice in Wonderland campaign by The Beard.

- To enable this feature, simply check t.msgid: - To enable this feature, simply check the box for Show Fan-made cards under Settings. If you aren't interested in fan-made content, you don't have to change anything, by default you won't see these cards in the app.

- Decks containing 'fan-made' cards (inc.msgid: - Decks containing 'fan-made' cards (including Barkham Horror), cannot be uploaded or saved to ArkhamDB. When editing an ArkhamDB deck, these custom cards will be hidden.

- Fan-made cards are shown with a small.msgid: - Fan-made cards are shown with a small watermark icon indicating what set they came from, so you can tell they are unofficial.

Have some fan-made content you'd like to.msgid: Have some fan-made content you'd like to see in the app, let me know at [arkhamcards@gmail.com](mailto:arkhamcards@gmail.com).

At long last, the ability to share campa.msgid: At long last, the ability to share campaigns has been released on both iOS and Android! This has been one of the most requested features from the start, but as it required a completely new set of servers to be written (and paid for), it took me some time to get it right. You can of course continue using the app exactly as it is, but if you find yourself using multiple devices or want to share an in-progress campaign with friends so everyone can collaborate on it, this is the feature for you.

- First sign up for an <b>Arkham Cards</.msgid: - First sign up for an Arkham Cards account via the Settings tab, to unlock these features. Don't forget to set your handle so your friends can find you on the app.

- On the main screen of every campaign (.msgid: - On the main screen of every campaign (or when creating a new one), there is a new option to 'Upload' the campaign to the cloud. This will cause the campaign to be synced between all of your devices.

- After uploading the campaign, you'll f.msgid: - After uploading the campaign, you'll find a new option on the campaign to Edit players. Simply select your friends and the campaign will pop up in their app as well.

- Then just use the campaign as normal -.msgid: - Then just use the campaign as normal -- decisions and changes that you make will be synced automatically with everyone, including the chaos bag.

- If someone else saves your deck for yo.msgid: - If someone else saves your deck for you at the end of a scenario, you'll need to open the campaign to Claim the previous scneario's XP for yourself.

If you like to make changes to your deck.msgid: If you like to make changes to your decks on ArkhamDB as well as in the app, just pop open the app and make sure you see your latest deck updates there. After opening the app it should remain in sync, but if you use the app infrequently the ArkhamDB login might expire and need to be authorized.

If you build decks for multiple players.msgid: If you build decks for multiple players from a single card collection, this release is for you. By adding the decks to a shared campaign, the app will calculate which cards are included in too many decks (based on your collection).

If the deck has been added to a campaign.msgid: If the deck has been added to a campaign, you'll also see this on the bottom of each deck in that campaign.

Edge of the Earth campaign is now out.msgid: Edge of the Earth campaign is now out

The full setup instructions for Edge of.msgid: The full setup instructions for Edge of the Earth campaigns are now available in the app! This was the largest single drop of campaign content in the history of the game and a large group of volunteers helped prepare the story text so I could focus on the new mechanics to get this out as close to release date as possible.

Frost tokens ([frost]) are also now avai.msgid: Frost tokens ([frost]) are also now available in the digital chaos bags for all Edge of the Earth campaigns.

<center>\"Never tell me the odds!\" - Ha.msgid: <center>"Never tell me the odds!" - Han Solo</center>

Sorry Han, this isn't the feature for yo.msgid: Sorry Han, this isn't the feature for you. When it came time to try to work [bless] and [curse] tokens into the existing odds calculator, this app's visual designer (Eugene Sarnetsky) worked hard to reimagine how to present the mathy information in a more intuitive and visual manner.

As you can see below, the results are in.msgid: As you can see below, the results are incredible:

In addition to giving you the numeric pa.msgid: In addition to giving you the numeric pass/fail rate as before, the new visual stacking of tokens based on their current modifiers lets you quickly intuit how much you stand to gain with an extra +1 to your skill value, without having to mess with the difficulty controls at all.

You'll also see small bands of color to.msgid: You'll also see small bands of color to represent [bless] and [curse] worked into the display. These are spaced to show how much your odds of passing changes if you draw a single [bless] or [curse] token: in the above picture a single [curse] token draw will cause 47% of the tokens in the bag to now result in a failure -- not great!

Down below you can also see the odds of.msgid: Down below you can also see the odds of drawing a [bless]/[curse] token based on the current bag contents. Here the adjustment to your success odds is shown as a range, the first number being drawing one token, the second if you were to draw multiple.

Did you know that this game has a thrivi.msgid: Did you know that this game has a thriving community of homebrew content creators? Well it does, and starting today, you'll start to find some of these campaigns and side-scenarios in the app.

Adding more campaigns will be an ongoing.msgid: Adding more campaigns will be an ongoing effort, but as of now we the following campaigns are available:

- Alice in Wonderland by The Beard.msgid: - Alice in Wonderland by The Beard

- Crown of Egil by The Mad Juggler.msgid: - Crown of Egil by The Mad Juggler

- Call of the Plaguebearer by Walker Gra.msgid: - Call of the Plaguebearer by Walker Graves

- Consternation on the Constellation - b.msgid: - Consternation on the Constellation - by The Mythos Busters

If you are a content creator who is inte.msgid: If you are a content creator who is interested in getting your (completed) campaign into the app, you can reach me at [arkhamcards@gmail.com](mailto:arkhamcards@gmail.com).

As a follow up to the earlier Ultimatum.msgid: As a follow up to the earlier Ultimatum of Chaos release, the app now supports building a deck via a set of drafting rules. Choose what packs you want to pull from and how big each draft 'hand' should be, and build your deck one card at a time.

- You can find this feature on the deck.msgid: - You can find this feature on the deck edit screen in the menu.

- Only level cards / decks can be drafte.msgid: - Only level cards / decks can be drafted.

- Given their unique deck-building restr.msgid: - Given their unique deck-building restrictions, the app does not yet support generating random decks for Lola Hayes or Joe Diamond. This is something that I will try to address in a future release.

The app now supports building random dec.msgid: The app now supports building random decks following the steps set out by the optional 'Ultimatum of Chaos' rule. When constructing a new deck, a new option lets you choose a 'special deck', which can be used to either create the FFG suggested starter deck or a fully randomly generated one.

- The app will use your defined collecti.msgid: - The app will use your defined collection to try to generate the deck.

- Support the deckbuilding focused perma.msgid: - Support the deckbuilding focused permanents included in the Edge of the Earth Investigator expansion (Underworld Support/Forced Learning).

- Shows the deck before you actully save.msgid: - Shows the deck before you actully save it, so you can re-roll if it produced something particularly unviable.

Note: You might need to refresh the card.msgid: Note: You might need to refresh the cards once (using Check for card updates).

Good news for players who use Arkham Car.msgid: Good news for players who use Arkham Cards with more than one device, if you sign into your Arkham Cards account your settings will now sync between devices automatically!

- This includes your collection + spoile.msgid: - This includes your collection + spoiler settings, as well as many general app preferences.

I've had some reports of slower performa.msgid: I've had some reports of slower performance on some devices, and have a new "Low Memory Mode" setting to try out.

- If you've been experiencing slow app b.msgid: - If you've been experiencing slow app behavior in anyway, please try it out.

- And if you try it out, send me an emai.msgid: - And if you try it out, send me an email at arkhamcards@gmail.com, I would love to hear how it is working in the wild.

BTW, support for the newly announced mec.msgid: BTW, support for the newly announced mechanic from The Scarlet Keys is in the works, so stay tuned.

This release adds the newly finished fan.msgid: This release adds the newly finished fan-made Cyclopean Foundations campaign by The Beard.

- Includes a fully guided mode, with all.msgid: - Includes a fully guided mode, with all setup and resolution text accounted for.

This update also adds support for \"The.msgid: This update also adds support for "The Colour Out of Space", a fan-made standalone scenario.

This release introduces faster access to.msgid: This release introduces faster access to previewed cards.

- Includes the previewed <b>Customizable.msgid: - Includes the previewed Customizable cards from The Scarlet Keys investigator expansion.

- In order to maintain compatibility wit.msgid: - In order to maintain compatibility with ArkhamDB, these cards are not shown by default. You can opt into them by enabling the Show Fan-made cards under Settings.

This release adds support for the newly.msgid: This release adds support for the newly released Scarlet Keys campaign expansion.

- As you may know (or will soon find out.msgid: - As you may know (or will soon find out), this is by far the most ambitious campaign we've ever seen in Arkham. I've done my best to handle the new features as faithfully as I can in the app, and am pretty pleased with the implementation.

- I've done my best to test the corners.msgid: - I've done my best to test the corners of this campaign, but it is quite possible there will be some mistakes or bugs in the implementation still - if you find any please let me know at [arkhamcards@gmail.com](mailto:arkhamcards@gmail.com) and I will try to fix them as quickly as possible. But given the expansive nature of the campaign, it is possible in a worst case scenario that some progress might need to be re-entered.

- I've also taken the liberty of includi.msgid: - I've also taken the liberty of including some small story reminders when map locations become unlocked through the course of play. I tried my best to capture the story text, and hope you find it helpful (in case like me you sometimes go weeks between game sessions).

As always, many thanks to my many suppor.msgid: As always, many thanks to my many supporters on Patreon -- I appreciate your support which helps make all of this possible.
